segments.text: This is ridiculous, the sink is overflowing and no one's turning it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling all over the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, drying a stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, and she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing to steal cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy's on an unstable stool, it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He'll probably fall and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's encouraging him, reaching up too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks fine, but inside it's a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this chaos right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so frustrated watching this happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
